pages.text: And if your Master wanted, He would have made the people a single community (of faith), but they would not stop to disagree
except anyone whom your Master had mercy on, and for that He created them. And word of your Master fulfilled: I shall fill hell with the Jinn and the people altogether
And all that we tell you from stories of the messengers is what We strengthen your heart with it, and the truth and an advice and a reminder came to you for the believers in this
And say to those who do not believe: do what you are capable of, and indeed we are doers
and wait, indeed we are also waiting
The unseen of the skies and the earth belongs to God, and all the affairs are returned to Him, so serve Him and put your trust in Him. And you Master is not negligent of what you do
L.R. (Alif. Lam. Ra.) These are verses of the clear (and clarifying) book
We sent it down, an Arabic Quran, so that you may understand
We tell you the best stories in what We revealed to you in this Quran while you were of the negligent ones before it
(Remember) when Joseph said to his father: my father, indeed I saw (in my dream) eleven stars and the sun and the moon, I saw them being humble before me
